0.title: Hair mask for bleached and dyed hair (laminate protect technology)
0.description:
• Increase hair health with essential ingredients such as keratin, wheat germ, sunflower oil, walnut oil, vitamin E, vitamin B5 and B3.
  • Increasing resistance, flexibility, shine and preventing bleached hair from becoming dull by creating a natural blonde color.
  • Increasing hair softness, strengthening the hair shaft, nourishing the hair follicle, softening dyed hair and reducing hair electricity.

1.title: Hair mask for dry and damaged hair (laminate protect technology)
1.description:
• Caring for the hair structure, preventing hair dryness and protecting it from the sun's rays with effective ingredients such as argan, Buriti, sunflower and wheat germ oils.
  • Keratin moisturizer and restorer for dry, rough and frizzy hair
  • Softening, thickening and nourishing, containing vitamin E and group B vitamins (B2, B3, B5, B6, B12).
  • Dealing with dryness of the hair shaft and scalp fat, moisturizing, protecting and restoring hair keratin
  • Contains biotin, zinc and hydrolyzed creatine
